S

send(ArrayList<File>) - Method in class Groundstation.Sender
Method to handle all things required to send a file to the Master Station Uses sockets to send streams of data
Sender - Class in Groundstation
This class enables sending files to the Master Station using TCP/IP data transfer through sockets Allows to zip multiple files into packet Sends packet to the Master station using bit output stream Based upon: https://examples.javacodegeeks.com/core-java/util/zip/zipoutputstream/java-zip-file-example/
Sender() - Constructor for class Groundstation.Sender
 
Sender(String, int) - Constructor for class Groundstation.Sender
Constructor that creases a sender object based upon provided IP address of the Master Station and port number
setMoreData(boolean) - Method in class Masterstation.Receiver
Method to set value used to control the loop inside the thread moreData - boolean value to determine if any additional data is being received
setPortNum(int) - Method in class Masterstation.Receiver
Method to set the port number to a new value
setSettings(String, String, int, int) - Static method in class Groundstation.GS_Manager
Method to create objects for sending data, based on setting set by the user in GS_GUI
setwaitTimeMillis(long) - Method in class Groundstation.ZipFileTimer
Method to set file archiving frequency
setWatching(boolean) - Method in class Groundstation.WatchDir
Method to set value used to control the loop inside the thread watching - boolean value to determine if watcher thread needs to be executed
start(Stage) - Method in class Groundstation.GS_GUI
Method create and display GUI for Ground Station
